frontmatter.title: Dart Programming Language Tutorial Part 7 | If Else and Ternary Operators in Dart
frontmatter.description: In this post we will cover the if-else statement in Dart. If-else block is one of the basic building blocks of many programming languages, let's look into it right away.

frontmatter.title: Dart Programming Language Tutorial Part 6 | Built-In Types Part 2
frontmatter.description: In the last post we discussed numbers, strings and booleans. In this one, we will conclude built-in types by discussing lists and maps. Let's get started.

frontmatter.title: Dart Programming Language Tutorial Part 5 | Built-In Types Part 1
frontmatter.description: In this post we will discuss some of the built-in types in dart. We will cover numbers, strings, and booleans. Let's get started.

frontmatter.title: Dart Programming Language Tutorial Part 4 | Comments
frontmatter.description: In this post we will look into various ways in which we can write comments in dart. Let's get started.

frontmatter.title: Dart Programming Language Tutorial Part 3 | Final,Const, and Default Values
frontmatter.description: In the last post we looked into how to declare and print variables. In this post we will conclude the section on variables by discussing about final and const keywords and default values

frontmatter.title: Dart Programming Language Tutorial Part 2 | Variables
frontmatter.description: In this post we will look into various ways in which we can declare and use variable. We will also learn some syntax of dart and how to print values of variables. Let's dive right into it.

frontmatter.title: Dart Programming Language Tutorial Part 1 | Series Introduction
frontmatter.description: A general introduction to my dart programming language tutorial series. The post contains what dart is, which topics I am going to cover here and future plans. So let's dive right into the post.
